dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S956 IS: To permanently suspend application of certain agricultural price support authority.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To permanently suspend application of certain agricultural price support authority.

section.header: Permanent suspension of price support authority

subsection.text: The following provisions of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 shall not be applicable to covered commodities (as defined in section 1001 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 8702)), peanuts, and sugar and shall not be applicable to milk:

paragraph.text: Parts II through V of subtitle B of title III (7 U.S.C. 1326 et seq.).
In the case of upland cotton, section 377 (7 U.S.C. 1377).
Subtitle D of title III (7 U.S.C. 1379a et seq.).

subsection.text: The following provisions of the Agricultural Act of 1949 shall not be applicable to covered commodities (as defined in section 1001 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 8702)), peanuts, and sugar and shall not be applicable to milk:

paragraph.text: Title IV (7 U.S.C. 1421 et seq.), other than sections 404, 412, and 416 (7 U.S.C. 1424, 1429, and 1431).

subsection.text: The joint resolution entitled A joint resolution relating to corn and wheat marketing quotas under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, as amended, approved May 26, 1941 (7 U.S.C. 1330 and 1340), shall not be applicable to crops of wheat.
